overview:
Jason has filled many different roles in the technology industry over the last 14 years.

From a Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer managing internal office networks, to building sales and distribution channels for software partners, he’s developed a rounded skill-set that continues to prove successful with every new project around the corner.

Prior to joining GoFormz, Jason managed the San Diego territory for Motorola’s Enterprise Mobility Division. During that time he grew a struggling territory for both direct sales and channel partner involvement, and orchestrated the inception and funding of Broad Reach Mobility, a local value added reseller key for strategic growth inside of Motorola EMB.

milestones.description: Joined GoFormz as founder - VP of Business Dev.
